document_data.mainbody:
he Sylvan Guardians was a group of centaurs living in the forests of Shadowdale. They were generally standoffish with visitors, but helpful with anyone whose goals aligned with their own.
Some time during the year 1369 DR the centaurs went hunting for a group of goblins that plundered their home glade. This was most likely the raiding Broken Bones clans.
